snippet.title: Creeper World
snippet.description: Creeper World RTS game by Knuckle Cracker.  In Creeper World your base is surrounded by an enemy that moves across the map like an organic mass.  Utilize blasters, mortars, drone bombers and more to defend against the crushing blanket of destruction.  Demo and full game available at knucklecracker.com.
